author: 0xblacktemplar
content: hey everyone, whats the best way to get 32 Sep in the Sepolia testnet to be ready for testing the upcoming merge? The faucets I know only hand out small amounts, is the only way mining myself?

author: jgm
content: Sepolia is a permissioned network, you won't be able to run a validator on it.  You should run a validator on prater instead for testing the merge.

author: 0xblacktemplar
content: ok thank you for the info ðŸ™‚
